conversations.content: Who met with Iran’s Interim President Mohammad Mokhber and members of late President Ebrahim Raisi’s administration on July 7, 2024?
Imam Khamenei, Leader of the Islamic Revolution, met with Iran’s Interim President Mohammad Mokhber and members of late President Ebrahim Raisi’s administration on July 7, 2024.
Where did the meeting between Imam Khamenei and the members of the 13th administration take place?
The meeting took place in the Imam Khomeini Hussainiyah on July 7, 2024.
How did Imam Khamenei describe the 13th administration during his meeting with its cabinet members?

Imam Khamenei described the 13th administration as one of 'work, hope, and action' while praising Martyr Raisi as a president who was 'truly hopeful and optimistic about the future and determined to achieve the set goals.'
What important trait of Martyr Raisi did Imam Khamenei highlight as a true model for all officials?

Imam Khamenei highlighted Martyr Raisi's people-centric approach as an important trait and a true model for all officials. He stated, 'By being among the people, our dear Raisi would feel the realities. He would listen to what people had to say and make their needs the basis for his plans.'
What did Imam Khamenei emphasize as an Islamic requirement for officials and authorities?

Imam Khamenei emphasized that 'being among the people' is an Islamic requirement for officials and authorities. Quoting Imam Ali's (pbuh) letter to Malik Ashtar, he added, 'Imam Ali (pbuh) stresses to Malik that the most beloved work in your eyes should be the one that gains the satisfaction and contentment of the masses. Martyr Raisi followed the same approach as Imam Ali (pbuh), and this too should serve as a model for all.'
What did Imam Khamenei say about Martyr Raisi's belief in domestic capabilities?

Imam Khamenei emphasized that Martyr Raisi had genuine faith in domestic capabilities. 'Raisi wholeheartedly believed in the potential and capacity of domestic resources to solve the country’s problems,' he said.
How did Imam Khamenei describe Martyr Raisi's approach to expressing his religious and revolutionary stances?

Imam Khamenei stated that Martyr Raisi was straightforward in adhering to the revolutionary positions that he believed in, and he expressed them clearly. In his very first interview, he was asked about [whether Iran was seeking] relations with a particular country, 'Will you be establishing relations?' He said, 'No.' and adhered to this clear and straightforward position until the very end.
What did Imam Khamenei say about Martyr Raisi's work ethic?

Imam Khamenei praised Martyr Raisi for his indefatigability in work. 'I would repeatedly say to Raisi that you need to rest some in order to be able to continue working in the future, otherwise you will collapse one day and not be able to work anymore. But he would say that he never got tired of work and he truly never did.'
What two aspects did Martyr Raisi adhere to in his interactions with others?

Martyr Raisi adhered to two aspects at the same time. One was interaction, and the other was dignity and respect. He was a person who interacted with others. He would sometimes talk on the phone with some European president for an hour or an hour and a half. Imagine actually talking on the phone for an hour and a half. He was a man of interaction, but his interaction was from a position of dignity. He wasn’t harsh and didn’t repel others, and he wouldn’t break off talks or give away concessions unnecessarily.
How did Martyr Raisi prioritize his interactions with other countries?

Martyr Raisi interacted from a position of honor with all countries that were possible, giving priority to neighbors. As a result, following his martyrdom, several prominent world leaders described Raisi as an exceptional figure, rather than an ordinary politician, in their messages of condolence.
What was the purpose of highlighting the qualities of Martyr Raisi?

The qualities of Martyr Raisi were mentioned to illustrate a model and to record it in history to demonstrate that the head of the executive branch can possess a set of intellectual, emotional, and practical virtues and pursue them in his governing and individual performance.
Who did Imam Khamenei express his heartfelt gratitude to in his concluding remarks?

Imam Khamenei expressed his heartfelt gratitude to the people and the diligent efforts of government officials, the Interior Ministry, the national media, security officials and the police force for successfully organizing the elections without any incidents.
How did Imam Khamenei compare the elections in Iran to those in other countries?
Imam Khamenei pointed out that 'In some countries around the world, elections are accompanied by fights and quarrels, while in our country, the elections were held in the best possible manner.'
